# About me
![](https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=782304915195492&set=a.273060612786594.62697.100002479733704&type=1&permPage=1)
Hi, I am an Undergrad student at IIT kanpur majoring in physics. When I am not staring at some code you could find me at the basketball field shooting 3-pointers or in the chess club solving chess puzzles.If there is an exam tommorow I _might_ be present in the library. To see all my awesome coding work visit my github profile. You can contact me on facebook.

* [fb](https://www.facebook.com/shikher.verma.1)
* [github](https://github.com/ShikherVerma)
